channel.title: Products on TEDIMAL
channel.description: Recent content in Products on TEDIMAL

item.title: ClipTodo
item.description:
Features

  • A menu bar app for Mac.
  • A simple Todo app.
  • Manage tasks and subtasks.
  • Drag & drop to reorder items.
  • Export to a text file.
  • Font customization.

Requirements

  • macOS 14.6 or later

Link

  • https://apps.apple.com/kr/app/cliptodo/id6758076769?mt=12

Privacy

  • No personal data is collected.

item.title: HoldItMemo
item.description:
Features

  • A menu bar app for Mac.
  • A simple menu app.
  • Automatically registers copied clipboard content as a memo.
  • Pin memos to the top.
  • Search functionality.
  • Font customization.

Requirements

  • macOS 14.6 or later

Link

  • https://apps.apple.com/kr/app/holditmemo/id6758209889?mt=12

Privacy

  • No personal data is collected.
